pkgmetadata.longdescription: The goal of this library is to provide an easy to use programming interface to the serial ports of the Linux system. This release comes with some support for the CYGWIN toolchain. Due to the great work of the cygwin folks, only minimal changes are needed. I know that the cygwin-stuff of 'ezV24' isn't the final stuff, but it's a first step and it works.
